verses.text: At the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* of \add every\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a \w release|strong="H8059"\w*.

And this \add is\add* the \w manner|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w release|strong="H8059"\w*: Every \w creditor|strong="H1167"\w* that \w lendeth|strong="H5383"\w* \add ought\add* unto his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* shall \w release|strong="H8058"\w* \add it;\add* he shall not \w exact|strong="H5065"\w* \add it\add* of his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, or of his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*; because it is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w release|strong="H8059"\w*.\f + \fr 15.2 \ft creditor: Heb. master of the lending of his hand\f*

Of a \w foreigner|strong="H5237"\w* thou mayest \w exact|strong="H5065"\w* \add it again:\add* but \add that\add* which is thine with thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall \w release|strong="H8058"\w*;

\w Save|strong="H0657"\w* when there shall be no \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* among you; for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w greatly|strong="H1288"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee \add for\add* an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it:  +  r 15.4  t Save…: or, To the end that there be no poor among you *

Only if thou \w carefully|strong="H8085"\w* \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all these \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w blesseth|strong="H1288"\w* thee, as he \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* thee: and thou shalt \w lend|strong="H5670"\w* unto \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, but thou shalt not \w borrow|strong="H5670"\w*; and thou shalt \w reign|strong="H4910"\w* over \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, but they shall not \w reign|strong="H4910"\w* over thee.

¶ If there be among you a poor \w man|strong="H0034"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* within \w any|strong="H0259"\w* of thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* in thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee, thou shalt not \w harden|strong="H0553"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, nor \w shut|strong="H7092"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* from thy \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*:

But thou shalt \w open|strong="H6605"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w wide|strong="H6605"\w* unto him, and shalt \w surely|strong="H5670"\w* \w lend|strong="H5670"\w* him \w sufficient|strong="H1767"\w* for his \w need|strong="H4270"\w*, \add in that\add* which he \w wanteth|strong="H2637"\w*.

\w Beware|strong="H8104"\w* that there be not a \w thought|strong="H1697"\w* in thy \w wicked|strong="H1100"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w release|strong="H8059"\w*, is at \w hand|strong="H7126"\w*; and thine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* be \w evil|strong="H7489"\w* against thy \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, and thou \w givest|strong="H5414"\w* him nought; and he \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* against thee, and it be \w sin|strong="H2399"\w* unto thee.\f + \fr 15.9 \ft thought: Heb. word\f*\f + \fr 15.9 \ft wicked: Heb. Belial\f*

Thou shalt \w surely|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* him, and thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* shall not be \w grieved|strong="H3415"\w* when thou \w givest|strong="H5414"\w* unto him: \w because|strong="H1558"\w* that for this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee in all thy \w works|strong="H4639"\w*, and in all that thou \w puttest|strong="H4916"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* unto.

For the \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* shall never \w cease|strong="H2308"\w* out \w of|strong="H7130"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: therefore I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou shalt \w open|strong="H6605"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w wide|strong="H6605"\w* unto thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, to thy \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, and to thy \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*, in thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ \add And\add* if thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, an Hebrew \w man|strong="H5680"\w*, or an Hebrew \w woman|strong="H5680"\w*, be \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* unto thee, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* thee \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*; then in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt let him \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w* from thee.
And when thou \w sendest|strong="H7971"\w* him out \w free|strong="H2670"\w* from thee, thou shalt not let him go \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*:

Thou shalt \w furnish|strong="H6059"\w* him \w liberally|strong="H6059"\w* out of thy \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, and out of thy \w floor|strong="H1637"\w*, and out of thy \w winepress|strong="H3342"\w*: \add of that\add* wherewith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* thee thou shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto him.

And thou shalt \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* that thou wast a \w bondman|strong="H5650"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* thee: therefore I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And it shall be, if he \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, I will not go \w away|strong="H3318"\w* from thee; because he \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* thee and thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, because he is \w well|strong="H2895"\w* with thee;

Then thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* an \w aul|strong="H4836"\w*, and \w thrust|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* through his \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* unto the \w door|strong="H1817"\w*, and he shall be thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*. And also unto thy \w maidservant|strong="H0519"\w* thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* likewise.

It shall not seem \w hard|strong="H7185"\w* unto \w thee|strong="H5869"\w*, when thou sendest him \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w* from thee; for he hath been \w worth|strong="H7939"\w* a \w double|strong="H4932"\w* hired \w servant|strong="H7916"\w* \add to thee\add*, in \w serving|strong="H5647"\w* thee \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee in all that thou \w doest|strong="H6213"\w*.

¶ All the \w firstling|strong="H1060"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w* that \w come|strong="H3205"\w* of thy \w herd|strong="H1241"\w* and of thy \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* thou shalt \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: thou shalt do no \w work|strong="H5647"\w* with the \w firstling|strong="H1060"\w* of thy \w bullock|strong="H7794"\w*, nor \w shear|strong="H1494"\w* the \w firstling|strong="H1060"\w* of thy \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.

Thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add it\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* by \w year|strong="H8141"\w* in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, thou and thy \w household|strong="H1004"\w*.

And if there be \add any\add* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w* therein, \add as if it be\add* \w lame|strong="H6455"\w*, or \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, \add or have\add* any \w ill|strong="H7451"\w* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*, thou shalt not \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* it unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it within thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*: the \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* and the \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \add person shall eat it\add* \w alike|strong="H3162"\w*, as the \w roebuck|strong="H6643"\w*, and as the \w hart|strong="H0354"\w*.
Only thou shalt not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* thereof; thou shalt \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* it upon the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* as \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.
